Articles.Content:
As we all know, the Ships folder in the root KSP directory provides an easy way to have ships across multiple saves. (I think).

Something I'd like is something like that for subassemblies as well.

Discuss.

It seems to me that the whole system of folders (including browsing support) for craft files and subassemblies will need revisiting at some point.

But, yes, I agree, I use the root ships folder for storing designs that I regard as being near-perfect and would use on any save.
